channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump plans to replace SEC chair Gary Gensler with crypto advocate Paul Atkins
item.description: Trump said Atkins, the CEO of Patomak Partners and a former SEC commissioner, was a “proven leader for common sense regulations.”

item.title: Inflation threatens Fed rate-cut expectations once again. Here’s why.
